Text:
GUYS.. it was a busy weekend for me .. one minor mistake with Acrobat:

HOW TO FIX.. after installing do this:
=======================
1. Navigate to AcrobatXPortable > App > DefaultData > Common.
2. Delete 'Adobe PCD' folder.

If it's already been installed, and used.. also delete here:
- AcrobatXPortable > Data > Common > Adobe PCD.

* this fixes Acrobat from closing after a few seconds.
* i apologize for the goof-up.

If you want a new PAF installer with this issue fixed:
===================================
http://www.pastebay.org/307070

F.Y.I
im not sure how many people are familiar with Lightroom. Graphics Designers from the old school are familiar with a program called iView MediaPro: which was great for making Catalogs of Stock, Vector, PSD Graphics. But it was bought out by Microsoft, discontinued and ruined. 

Lightroom is iView Media Pro on Steroids :)
It has 1000x's more templates and all are stunning. If you're a graphics designer or uploader of graphics: you want to check out Lightroom!

Here's a quick sample i uploaded to show the similarity to iView Media Pro:
http://www.pastebay.org/307136

For Questions or Help.. Post here:
https://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=113952&pid=712689#pid712689

PHOTOSHOP UPDATE: FEBRUARY 24, 2012
PhotoshopPortable_CS5.1_Rev.1_Multilingual
* This is a major update.. thus do a fresh install with this installer.

Changelog:
* Added support for Java (jPortable).
* Added PDF Profiles.
* Fixed "File Info" module. (provides support for meta-data, tagging, IPTC, XMP, copyright info. etc.)
* Added "GraphicRiver 3D That!" Action.
* Added "GraphicRiver Dimensions" Volume 1 & 2.
* Added "PhotoshopPortable" style.
* Added "Pimp my Image Processor": add's PNG, CMYK support to Image Processor. The Default Image Processor is located in the folder but has a .bak suffix.
* Improved overall functionality.
* Improved overall performance.
* More updates, plug-ins coming ... check back frequently ~

Go here for details and link:
https://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=113952&pid=712689#pid712689
